definitions.text: the statement (oral or written) of an exchange of promises
examples: they had an agreement that they would not interfere in each other's business
there was an understanding between management and the workers
there was no agreement between theory and measurement
the results of two tests were in correspondence

definitions.text: harmony of people's opinions or actions or characters
examples: the two parties were in agreement

definitions.text: the thing arranged or agreed to
examples: they made arrangements to meet in Chicago

definitions.text: the determination of grammatical inflection on the basis of word relations
